title: Chief Secretary Conducts State-Level Unique Identification Implementation Committee (UIDIC) meeting
content:
496/2025-2026

Aizawl, 5th February, 2026:The State-Level Unique Identification Implementation Committee (UIDIC) meeting for 2026 was held on 5th February 2026 in Aizawl, chaired by Shri Khilli Ram Meena, IAS, Chief Secretary, Mizoram.

Senior officials from UIDAI Regional Office, Guwahati including Shri Ngachan Zimik, DDG, UIDAI,RO, Guwahati, and Colonel Abhishek Koushik, Director, UIDAI RO, Guwahati, attended the meeting.

Heads of Departments of the Government of Mizoram including Sh.Sudhir Kumar, IAS , Principal Secretary, GAD, Govt. of Mizoram, Dr. Lalhriatzuali Ralte, IAS, Secretary, LESDE, , Smt. Zoramthangi Chhangte, Director, WCD , Lalrohlua, Joint Secretary, GAD and other senior officials were also present.

Shri Ngachan Zimik, DDG, UIDAI delivered the detailed presentation on the progress of Aadhaar enrolment in Mizoram, highlighting an upward trend in enrolment, updates, and usage across the state. He outlined key focus areas requiring immediate attention, including:

i) Accelerating Aadhaar enrolment for children (0–5 years) through Birth Registration Based Aadhaar Enrolment (BRBAE) at district hospitals & health facilities using Birth Registration No.(BRN). The CS directed the Department of Health to ensure the optimum utilisation of Aadhaar enrolment kits to accelerate child enrolment in the state.

ii) Improving Aadhaar enrolment in low-saturation districts - Hnahthial, Lawngtlai, Khawzawl and Serchhipiii) Conducting Mission Mode Mandatory Biometric Update (MBU) camps in schools. The CS directed the Department of School Education to enhance MBU camps and take the assistance of GAD (Nodal Dept.), if necessary.

iv) Explore the feasibility of digitisation of non digitised documents issued by State Govt. and incorporate QR Code on the documents to check the veracity of documents. The CS directed the Departments to ensure the digitisation of documents in a digitally verifiable format.

v) Expanding the use of Aadhaar authentication for transparent and efficient service delivery. The CS directed the Dept. Of Information & Communication Technology to onboard as an AUA (Authentication User Agency) at the earliest

Sh. Zimik DDG UIDAI RO Guwahati also informed that a new Aadhaar Seva Kendra is being established in Aizawl and is likely to be operational by 31st March 2026. CS, Mizoram welcomed the news and stated that it would significantly cater to the requirements of the people of Mizoram, particularly the residents of Aizawl.

DDG, UIDAI RO Guwahati also highlighted the importance of new Aadhaar App and CS directed that the App may be downloaded and used for attendance by the officials posted at the secretariat.

Concluding the meeting, the Chief Secretary emphasized the importance of coordinated efforts among all departments and the UIDAI Regional Office, Guwahati to achieve the desired results in a time-bound manner.

title: Serchhip DC hoin Fire Prevention Week 2026 hman dan tur rel
content:
4315/2025-2026

Dated Serchhip, the 5th February, 2026 :Vawiin khan District Level Committee on Fire Prevention chu Serchhip DC Pisapui Hall-ah an Chairman Pu Paul L Khuma, Serchhip DC hoin an thukawm a. Fire Prevention Week 2026 hman dan tur an rel.

State Level Committee on Fire Prevention, 2026 thutkhawmin an lo rel tawh angin Fire Prevention Week chu February ni 9 atanga 13 chhung neih tur a ni a. Serchhip District-ah a hawnna inkhawm chu February ni 11, chawhma dar 11ah Serchhip DC Pisapui Hall-ah neih ni se, DC Pu Paul L.Khuma chu he hunah hian khuallian ni se tiin an rel a ni.

March ni 15 ral hmaa lo hal vek tura State Level Committee-in a lo rel tawh te, meikawng sial tura hriattirna te leh kangmei laka invenhimna tha zawk a awm theih nan mipuite hnena ngenna leh hriattirna chu DC in a tichhuak dawn a. Fire Prevention chungchanga awareness campaign chu awmze nei zawka neih a nih theih nan Environment Forest & Climate Changte Department te kaihhruaina hnuaiah school zirlai te leh loneitute zirtirna ngawrh leh zuala pek ni se, an ti a. Social media kaltlangin e-flyer thehdarh a ni dawn a. Banner leh poster te hmun pawimawhah tarchhuakin kangmei ven pawimawhzia inzirtir a ni ang. Serchhip District khaw puma YMA chanchinbute chu Fire Prevention Week denchhen hian inelna neih tir tura ruahman a ni a. Rural Development & Administration Department te chuan February thlaa Ni 100 inhlawhna lo chhuah hunah kangmei ven inzirtirna uar takin mipui zingah an kalpui dawn bawk a ni.

Serchhip District chhunga kangmei ven kawnga hma la tha khuate hnenah lawmman siam a ni leh dawn a. A endik turin EF&CC Department lamin Sub Headquarters YMA te an thawhpui ang. Kumin hian kangmei ven kawnga titha khuate inelnaa lawmman dawn tur sumfai tihpun a nih dawn bakah District tina titha lawmman pakhatna dawngtute chu Mizoram pum huap inelnaah an tel chhunzawm dawn a. District hrang hrangte inelna pawh neih chhunzawm tur niin lawmman sumfai inpek thin erawh kuminah hian a awm dawn lo a ni.

Vawiin thutkhawmah hian Environment Forests and Climate Change Department hotute, sawrkar official dang te leh tlawmngai pawl te an tel a ni.

title: Lungleiah District chhunga Rural Development scheme hrang hranga hma lakna thlir ho a ni
content:
4314/2025-2026

Lunglei, 2026 Ramtuk thla ni 5:Vawiin khan Lunglei District Bawrhsap Pi Navneet Mann kaihhruaiin Lunglei DC Conference Hall-ah Lunglei District chhunga thingtlang hmasawnna tur ruahmanna (rural development scheme) hrang hrang kalpui dan leh hma lakna dinhmun thlir hona (quarterly review meeting) buatsaih a ni a. District Rural Development Office (DRDO) leh Block Development Office (BDO)-te hma lakna report ngaihthlak niin, hmasawnna tur leh ṭan lak ngaihna laite, harsatna hrang hrang chin fel dan turte sawi ho a ni.

Bawrhsap Pi Navneet Mann chuan Lunglei District-a thingtlang khuate hmasawnna tura DRDO leh BDO-te kal tlanga hma lakna chu ṭha thawkhata a hriat thu sawiin, thawktute inpekna a fak a. RD scheme hnuaia thawktute inkarah leh department dang nena thawh honaah inlaichinna leh thawh hona ṭha tak vawng nung zel tur leh ṭhahnem ngai lehzuala thawk zel turin thawktute a chah a. Scheme hrang hrang hnuaia hmeichhiate dinhmun chawi kanna lam ngai pawimawh tur te, mipuite'n scheme hrang hrang an hriat chian nana inzirtir uar tur te, hna reng reng ṭha tak leh tlo tak a nih theih nana vil uluk tur leh sawrkarin hlen chhuah tura a tukte ṭha taka hlen chhuah tum zel tur te'n a chah bawk.

Lunglei DRDO Project Director Pi Zoramdini chuan thawktute inpekna leh ṭhahnem ngaihnaah lawm thu sawiin, an hna thawh ṭha tak chu chhawm nung zel a, hmasawn zel tum turin a chah a. RD scheme hrang hrang chu DC leh DRDO aṭanga ṭha taka an vilpui reng thu sawiin, thawktute'n harsatna an neih chu inthlahrung lova hotute hnena thlen zel turin a chah.

Quarterly review meeting-ah hian Lunglei District chhunga RD Block pali — Bunghmun, Lunglei, Lungsen leh Tlabung block-a Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA), Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana – Gramin (PMAY-G), Mizoram State Rural Livelihoods Mission (MzSRLM), Lakhpati Didi Initiative, Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) leh scheme hrang hrang kal tlanga hma laknate chu uluk taka thlir ho a ni a. BDO-te leh scheme hrang hranga mawhphurtute'n PowerPoint presentation hmangin an hna thawh leh hlawhtlinnate an tar lang a. Sawi hona hun hlawk tak hman a ni bawk.

Lunglei District chhungah hian MGNREGA hnuaiah job card hman lai (active) 20,396 a awm a. Tun kum kal mek (2025–26)-ah ni 92 inhlawhna siam tawh niin, ni 100 inhlawhna siam theih beisei a ni a. Tun kum kal meka MGNREGA hnuaia hna thawh tur ruahman 2,714 zinga 2,331 chu thawh zawh tawh a ni.

PMAY-G hnuaiah kum 2016–2024 chhungin chhungkaw 3,278 chu in sak ṭanpuina pek niin, in 3,142 sak zawh a ni a; chhan hrang hrang vanga chhunzawm theih loh 101 leh sak mek 31 a awm a. Awaas+ 2018-a in sak ṭanpuina pek 1,108 aṭangin 1,027 chu sak zawh tawh niin, chhunzawm theih loh 69 leh sak mek 16 a awm bawk.

MzSRLM hnuaiah Lunglei District-ah Self Help Group (SHG) 1,157 din tawh niin, member 8,446 an awm mek a. Village Organisation (VO) 94 leh Cluster Level Federation (CLF) 11 an awm.

Khuallian Pu James Lalnithanga chuan Zokhawtharin tui hnianghnar taka hman tur nei a, Sorkarin an mahni enkawltur a pe chu a lawmpui thu sawiin, Hei hi sorkar hmalakna a ni mai lova, khawtlang nena tanrualna tur, inrintawnna keng tel a ni tih an hriat thar a tul hle a ni, a ti a. He project-in a tak ram a chan theihna tura PHE Department hmalakna lawmawm a tih thu sawiin, Zokhawthar chu Mizorama tlawhtu ngah berte zinga mi a ni a. Tui thianghlim a neih hi a tul mai ni lovin Mizoram hmel tihlanna a ni tel a. India ram anga ngaihtuah pawhin kan ramin inrelbawlna tha a nei tih lantirtu a ni tel nghal, tih a sawi. Khuallian chuan PHE Deparment hmalakna hian Zokhawthar khawtlang tan hriselna a thlen ngei a beisei thu sawiin, tui atanga natna kai thinte a ziaawmin khawtlang nun pumpui chawikang se a duh thu a sawi a. A enkawl zui kawngah Department aiin khawtlang kutah a innghat thui zawk dawn a. Zokhawthar khawtlang chu a vawnhim leh enkawl kawngah te, tui renchemna lamah te tan la zel turin a sawm a ni.

Sports Minister chuan India ramin kum 2036-ah Olympics thlen tumin hma a la mek a, Mizo te kan lan ve theihnan nasa takin hmasawn kan la mamawh thu a sawi a, infrastructure tha tak tak ngah lam ni loin Human Resource development-ah tan kan ngaih thu a sawi. Pu Lalnghinglova Hmar chuan Sawrkarin Mamit hmasawn zelna atan hmalak zel thu sawiin NH-44 A kawng te a thatchhoh zel theihnan work order te peih fel a nih tawh thu a sawi a, Sawrkar Laipui lam hotute pawh concerned Minister nen an inbiak thu a sawi.

Vawiin hian Er H. Lalzirliana, Mamit Bialtu MLA chu Khual zahawm niin he multipurpose indoor stadium din theihna atana hmalatu te hnenah lawmthu a sawi a, mi thiam tak tak state leh national level a chhuak thei tur Mamit thalai chherchhuah a nih theih ngei a beisei thu a sawi bawk.

Vawiin hun hi Pu Henry C.Lalrawnkima, Secretary, Mizoram State Sports Coucil chuan a kaihruai a, Pu K Laltlawmlova, District Bawrhsap leh Chairman District Sports Committee chuan a telpui.

Pu James Lalramnghaka, Asst Engineer, MSSC-in Mamit Multipurpose Indoor Stadium sakna atana senso technical report a pek angin, SEDP leh SASCI atangin Rs. 1250 lakh seng a sak a ni a. Ni 12 April, 2021 a sak tan niin Ni 10th June, 2025 khan sak zawh a ni. A building len zawng hi a dung 50.00m, a vang 30.00m a zau niin mizopa chhiara chhawng thum(3) a sak a ni a, Basement Floor, Ground Floor, First Floor leh Gallery Level te a awm a ni.
